description:
“WHY"? For all the actions of the human beings there is a “ WHY “ . I will start with mine. Years ago, I started my personal development process, and for the very beginning till now I have improved some characteristics as : manners, financial education, personal style , body sculpture and others. Through my transformation, I learned an important rule, which is : by helping the others, you help yourself much more. So I created this course to help the men around the world improve themselves. This is just one rule which changed my way of thinking, but there are more in the course.

“WHY" should you buy my course? “WHY" should you trust this summary? I don't know. Maybe you will take the course and consider it is worthless, but maybe you will change your life in a massive success. In this course is my life, my experience, what I did in order to become what I a today. There are hundreds of programs for personal development, but I consider that mine is diferent, and if it worked for me, it could work for you too.

“WHY" are you here? Probably you want to learn something new, or you were attracted here by the course image. “WHY" should you pay 100 $ for a personal development course when you can buy another course from Udemy which presents, for example, Excel skills that can help you receive a promotion at work? An answer might be that your own education is more important for a long term result that a quick promotion.

This course provides a step by step plan for your personal development. Each video contains explanations and useful examples. For some videos I have uploaded a pdf/doc file with rules and common mistakes from that category. Also, at the end, I've upload the written version of the course, to make sure I will make myself clear and you will understand everything I have presented, because I am not a native speaker of English, so I might have made some punctuation and spelling mistakes.
title: From man to gentleman
